info.description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN Trust Domains ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.

get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-Domains
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-Domains.

ValueSet-Domains.title: WHO GDHCN Trust Domains Schema
ValueSet-Domains.description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN Trust Domains ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-Domains.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the WHO GDHCN Trust Domains ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust/ValueSet-Domains.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
